name: Kartavya Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Kartavya Charitable Trust is coming up with "Kartavya Edu-Complex". A complete residential school with proper nourishment alongwith general clothing in a very healthy atmosphere, is going to be established in and around Mumbai for the upliftment of the underprivileged children. The Edu-complex will be from Pre-nursery to +2 level under CBSE/ICSE curriculum.

address: House No 419E, GH- 2, Shikhar Apartments, 5MDC, Panchkula
